title: Is there a way I can organize my app screen and make folders?
content: I just recently transfered over from LG to the pixel 3xl. I am trying to personalize, customize, and organize my phone to my preferences. It seems like the app screen is just one big long list so I am trying to create folders in it to make it more user friendly to find things better. I can't seem to figure out how if it is even possible.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
